name: Lands of Lore: Guardians of Destiny

write_file.content:
[sdl]
sensitivity=30
fullresolution=desktop
windowresolution=original
fullscreen=true
output=opengl
[render]
aspect=true
scaler=normal2x
[autoexec]
mount C "$GAMEDIR" -t dir
c:
CD  lore
lolg.exe -CD ..
exit

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select GOG installer.
- inno: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/lore.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $inno
- execute:
    args: -I "app/Lands of Lore 2" -d "$CACHE" "$game"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      find "$src" -maxdepth 1 -type d \( -iname "DAT" -o -iname "SAVEGAME" -o -iname
      "WOMS" \) -exec cp -r {} "$dst" \;

      find "$src" -maxdepth 1 -type f \( -iname "*.dll" -o -iname "*.mix" -o -iname
      "*.LS*" -o -iname "*.TRR" -o -iname "*.BNK" -o -iname "*.386" -o -iname "*.EXE"
      -o -iname "*.ENG" -o -iname "*.DAT" -o -iname "*.SHP" -o -iname "*.INI" -o -iname
      "*.HMI" \) -exec cp {} "$dst" \;'
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/lore
    file: mkdir
- execute:
    args: '''$CACHE/app/Lands of Lore 2''  ''$GAMEDIR/lore'''
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app/Lands of Lore 2/manual.pdf
- write_file:
    content: '[sdl]

      sensitivity=30

      fullresolution=desktop

      windowresolution=original

      fullscreen=true

      output=opengl

      [render]

      aspect=true

      scaler=normal2x

      [autoexec]

      mount C "$GAMEDIR" -t dir

      c:

      CD  lore

      lolg.exe -CD ..

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/lore.conf
